---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Gets a 5-day weather forecast with random temperature data"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/WeatherForecast"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns an array of weather forecasts for the next 5 days starting from tomorrow.
Each forecast includes date, temperature in Celsius and Fahrenheit, and a weather summary.

Sample response:
```json
[
  {
    "date": "2024-01-16",
    "temperatureC": 15,
    "temperatureF": 59,
    "summary": "Mild"
  }
]
```

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Returns the weather forecast data successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"required":["date","temperatureC"],"type":"object","properties":{"date":{"type":"string","description":"The date for this weather forecast","format":"date","example":"2024-01-16"},"temperatureC":{"maximum":55,"minimum":-20,"type":"integer","description":"Temperature in Celsius","format":"int32","example":15},"temperatureF":{"type":"integer","description":"Temperature in Fahrenheit (automatically calculated from Celsius)","format":"int32","readOnly":true,"example":59},"summary":{"type":"string","description":"Brief description of the weather conditions","nullable":true,"example":"Mild"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"Represents a weather forecast for a specific date","title":"WeatherForecast"}}}}},"500":{"description":"If there was an internal server error generating the forecast","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"type":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"title":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","nullable":true},"detail":{"type":"string","nullable":true},"instance":{"type":"string","nullable":true}},"additionalProperties":{},"title":"ProblemDetails"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
